      • sendCmd

        public void sendCmd(java.net.InetAddress senderHost,
           java.lang.String command)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Send an D-ITG command to an ITGSend process
        Parameters:
        senderHost - The InetAddress representing the ITGSend host
        command - The command the sender should run
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any parameters are null
        java.io.IOException - If the command could not be sent

      • sendCmd

        public void sendCmd(java.lang.String senderHost,
           java.lang.String command)
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Send an D-ITG command to an ITGSend process
        Parameters:
        senderHost - The IP address/hostname of the ITGSend host
        command - The command the sender should run
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If senderHost could not be resolved
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any parameters are null
        java.io.IOException - If the command could not be sent

      • catchMsg

        public ITGMessage catchMsg()
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                           java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Receive a message from the sender. This method is blocking
        Returns:
        An ITGMessage object representing the message
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a message could not be received
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If a message wasn't received correctly
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If a message was malformed

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the associated socket. This object may no longer be used once this method is called.
